name: Create a shortened Bitly link in Microsoft 365 Excel
description:
Every time you add a new row to your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet, Make will create a shortened Bitly link and update the worksheet.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygQ8z6tFG9zbd5xFf?e=D6WXtA).
